attributes.title: THIS APP IS SMELLS MY EGGPLANTS !!! üçÜüßöüèΩ‍‚ôÄÔ∏è
attributes.review: Ok so this app was really a terrible experience for me but first let me explain. So, when I first downloaded this app I expected a lot more from trump because he‚Äôs rich right? Soooo a few hours after I downloaded it I got a text from an unknown number. And it‚Äôs weird because nobody ever texts me cause I‚Äôm a lonely person and don‚Äôt have many friends but when I opened the text, it was Donald trump texting me !! I mean how could Donald trump even know my number? And he‚Äôs in a married relationship with that Barbie !!! And worst of all, his text said ‚Äúhey baby wanna come over to my place to have some fun?‚Äù I was like WHATTTT THEE HELLLLL!!! But then I decided to say yes so that Donald trump could be my sugar daddy and I could steal all his money mwahahaha. So I went over to his place and we had A LOT of fun üòèüòâ. After we were done playing, I walked around the White House and found where he kept the money and STOLE IT AND I RAN AWAY AS FAST AS I COULD!!! AND DONALD TRUMP WAS CHASING MEEE!! But Donald trump had a heart attack and died. So I went home, counted all the money and he had $100000000000000000000000000!! And then I just lived on with life and did a lot of shopping üòÅüßöüèΩ‍‚ôÄÔ∏è. And I was so happy my plan was a success. Donald trump died, I was rich, and Obama got back into office. I bought myself some Oompa Loompas because I was feeling lonely. And they lived happily ever after. THE END!! RIP Donald Trump ü§ß‚ú®üßöüèΩ‍‚ôÄÔ∏è‚ú®üßöüèΩ‍‚ôÄÔ∏èRan Into Pit of Hell‚ú®üßöüèΩ‍‚ôÄÔ∏è‚ú®‚ú®üßöüèΩ‍‚ôÄÔ∏è

attributes.title: This app has no lips, it will NOT get a kiss kiss
attributes.review: I GOT THIS APP THINKING THAT EVERYTHING OUR LOVELY PRESIDENT HAS DONE FOR US WILL FINALLY BE ACCESSIBLE! BOY WAS I WRONG. I THOUGHT THAT IF I GOT THIS APP, I‚ÄôD BE ABLE TO SEE EVERYTHING THE PRESIDENT HAS DONE FOR OUR GLORIOUS COUNTRY TO MAKE IT A BETTER PLACE TO LIVE. BUT ALL THIS APP GAVE ME WAS PARANOIA. IMMEDIATELY AFTER I GOT THIS APP, ALL THE LIGHTS IN MY HOUSE EXPLODED, BLINDING ME AND MY FAMILY. THEN, THE APP DOWNLOADED MY CREDIT CARD INFORMATION, WITHDREW $420.69, AND REFUSED A REFUND. I THOUGHT I‚ÄôD BE ABLE TO CUT FUNDING TO THIS APP LIKE THE PRESIDENT DID, HOWEVER I WASN‚ÄôT ABLE TO. FINALLY, I TRIED TO DELETE THIS APP FROM MY PHONE AND IT QUITE LITERALLY FORCED MY PHONE TO BEGIN SELF DESTRUCTING AND MELTED MY PHONE‚ÄôS BATTERY. This is what I imagine using the app will do to my life, none of this actually happened but screw this app and it‚Äôs creators.

attributes.title: Bee a better president
attributes.review: According to all known laws of aviation, there is no way that a bee should be able to fly. Its wings are too small to get its fat little body off the ground. The bee, of course, flies anyway. Because bees don‚Äôt care what humans think is impossible.‚Äù SEQ. 75 - ‚ÄúINTRO TO BARRY‚Äù INT. BENSON HOUSE - DAY ANGLE ON: Sneakers on the ground. Camera PANS UP to reveal BARRY BENSON‚ÄôS BEDROOM ANGLE ON: Barry‚Äôs hand flipping through different sweaters in his closet. BARRY Yellow black, yellow black, yellow black, yellow black, yellow black, yellow black...oohh, black and yellow... ANGLE ON: Barry wearing the sweater he picked, looking in the mirror. BARRY (CONT‚ÄôD) Yeah, let‚Äôs shake it up a little. He picks the black and yellow one. He then goes to the sink, takes the top off a CONTAINER OF HONEY, and puts some honey into his hair. He squirts some in his mouth and gargles. Then he takes the lid off the bottle, and rolls some on like deodorant. CUT TO: INT. BENSON HOUSE KITCHEN - CONTINUOUS Barry‚Äôs mother, JANET BENSON, yells up at Barry. JANET BENSON Barry, breakfast is ready! CUT TO: "Bee Movie" - JS REVISIONS 8/13/07 1. INT. BARRY‚ÄôS ROOM - CONTINUOUS BARRY Coming! SFX: Phone RINGING. Barry‚Äôs antennae vibrate as they RING like a phone. Barry‚Äôs hands are wet. He looks around for a towel. BARRY (CONT‚ÄôD) Hang on a second! He wipes his hands on his sweater, and pulls his antennae down to his ear and mouth. BARRY (CONT'D) Hello? His best friend, ADAM FLAYMAN, is on the other end. ADAM Barry? BARRY Adam? ADAM Can you believe this is happening? BARRY Can‚Äôt believe it. I‚Äôll pick you up. Barry sticks his stinger in a sharpener. SFX: BUZZING AS HIS STINGER IS SHARPENED. He tests the sharpness with his finger. SFX: Bing. BARRY (CONT‚ÄôD) Looking sharp. ANGLE ON: Barry hovering down the hall, sliding down the staircase bannister. Barry‚Äôs mother, JANET BENSON, is in the kitchen. JANET BENSON Barry, why don‚Äôt you use the stairs? Your father paid good money for those. "Bee Movie" - JS REVISIONS 8/13/07 2. BARRY Sorry, I‚Äôm excited. Barry‚Äôs father, MARTIN BENSON, ENTERS. He‚Äôs reading a NEWSPAPER with the HEADLINE, ‚ÄúQueen gives birth to thousandtuplets: Resting Comfortably.‚Äù MARTIN BENSON Here‚Äôs the graduate. We‚Äôre very proud of you, Son. And a perfect report card, all B‚Äôs. JANET BENSON (mushing Barry‚Äôs hair) Very proud. BARRY Ma! I‚Äôve got a thing going here. Barry re-adjusts his hair, starts to leave. JANET BENSON You‚Äôve got some lint on your fuzz. She picks it off. BARRY Ow, that‚Äôs me! MARTIN BENSON Wave to us. We‚Äôll be in row 118,000. Barry zips off. BARRY Bye! JANET BENSON Barry, I told you, stop flying in the house! CUT TO: SEQ. 750 - DRIVING TO GRADUATION EXT. BEE SUBURB - MORNING A GARAGE DOOR OPENS. Barry drives out in his CAR. "Bee Movie" - JS REVISIONS 8/13/07 3. ANGLE ON: Barry‚Äôs friend, ADAM FLAYMAN, standing by the curb. He‚Äôs

attributes.title: 0/10 DONT RECOMMEND
attributes.review: I got this app to update me on the 2020 president campaign‚Äôs or whatever because SOO many people are trump stans so I just had to check it out but as soon as I opened it the app literally stole 1,00000000000000000000000 dollars off of my Apple Pay accountüò¢ and then started glitching and then my pet zebra ü¶ì I was hiding In my basementüò≥ got hurt and I had no money left to take him to the vet and then when I went to get an ice pack, sourpatch kids, and some animal crackers to help calm him down I realized my refrigerator was broken and the sourpatch kids were melting and the animal crackers were rotting üíÄ but I had no money to fix it because the app literally took all of the moneyü§ë I had so all my sourpatch kids and animal crackers were ruined and my zebra was still hurt...andddd I tried to call the app or whatever and they wouldn‚Äôt replace my money sooooo yeah def don‚Äôt recommend‚ú®üßöüèªüñïüèª
